name: Nami
text: Activate: Main You may rest this and one of your leader or stage that has the (Dressrosa) type: Draw one card, then trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

effect.text: You may rest this and one of your leader or stage that has the (Dressrosa) type: Draw one card, then trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'SPECIAL' in image, but these are not part of the card's official printed data. The rarity is SP as printed.
